title: End game screen bugged
body: After finishing a game,going back to the lobby results, i can't see anybodies chats, also the champs are shown grayed out as if they had already left the lobby. i hang back abit to check but no messages at all. been like this for a while now this season. doesnt feel right not being able to say ggwp. :(  i type it anyways but dunno if they can see.
